docs.summary:
The wix-pay-backend module contains functionality for working with
 payments from backend code.
description: To use the Pay API, import `wixPay` from the `wix-pay-backend` module:
``` javascript
import wixPay from 'wix-pay-backend';

srcDocs.summary:
The wix-pay-backend module contains functionality for working with
 payments from backend code.
description: To use the Pay API, import `wixPay` from the `wix-pay-backend` module:
``` javascript
import wixPay from 'wix-pay-backend';

params.name: paymentRequest
params.doc: The information for the payment being created.
params.srcDoc: The information for the payment being created.

description: Before using the createPayment() function, you will need to set up your site to
accept payments. To learn more, see [About Accepting Payments](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-accepting-payments).
The `createPayment()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a [`PaymentRequest`](#PaymentRequest)
object when the payment request has been created.
Creating a payment is the first step in the process of accepting a payment from
a user. After creating the payment, call [`startPayment()`](wix-pay.html#startPayment)
from your site's client-side code using the payment ID returned by `createPayment`.
The [`startPayment()`](wix-pay.html#startPayment) function prompts the user
to select a payment method and continue the payment process.
Before using the createPayment() function, you will need to set up your site to
accept payments. To learn more, see [About Accepting Payments](https://support.wix.com/en/article/about-accepting-payments).
The `createPayment()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a [`PaymentRequest`](#PaymentRequest)
object when the payment request has been created.
Creating a payment is the first step in the process of accepting a payment from
a user. After creating the payment, call [`startPayment()`](wix-pay.html#startPayment)
from your site's client-side code using the payment ID returned by `createPayment`.
The [`startPayment()`](wix-pay.html#startPayment) function prompts the user
to select a payment method and continue the payment process.

docs.summary: An object representing a created payment.

srcDocs.summary: An object representing a created payment.

members.name: currency
members.docs:
Payment request currency. A three-letter
 [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) currency code.
members.srcDocs:
Payment request currency. A three-letter
 [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) currency code.

docs.summary: An object representing a payment item.

srcDocs.summary: An object representing a payment item.

docs.summary: An object representing a payment request.

srcDocs.summary: An object representing a payment request.

members.name: amount
members.docs:
Total payment request amount. Must equal
 the sum of the `price` properties in the `items` list while taking the
 `quantity` into account.
members.srcDocs:
Total payment request amount. Must equal
 the sum of the `price` properties in the `items` list while taking the
 `quantity` into account.

members.name: currency
members.docs:
Payment request currency. A three-letter
 [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) currency code. Defaults to
 the currency defined by the site's [Regional Settings](https://support.wix.com/en/article/changing-your-sites-regional-settings).
members.srcDocs:
Payment request currency. A three-letter
 [ISO-4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) currency code. Defaults to
 the currency defined by the site's [Regional Settings](https://support.wix.com/en/article/changing-your-sites-regional-settings).
